questions.question_text: Which option identifies the Prisma Cloud Compute Edition?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B.

Prisma Cloud Compute Edition is a downloadable, self-hosted software solution. It is installed and deployed within an organization's infrastructure to provide visibility, security, and compliance for cloud native applications and infrastructure.

choices.A: Visibility, Compliance, Governance, and Threat Detection and Response

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A

Old question: "It is currently in Beta, and lists capabilities for the Visibility, Compliance, and Governance and Threat Detection modules within Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM)." 

https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/blog/prisma-cloud/operationalize-prisma-cloud-adoption-advisor/

questions.question_text: Which categories does the Adoption Advisor use to measure adoption progress for Cloud Security Posture Management?
What are the three states of the Container Runtime Model? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCE
BCE 

Models are built from both static analysis (such as building a hashed process map based on parsing an init script in a Dockerfile ENTRYPOINT) and dynamic behavioral analysis (such as observing actual process activity during early runtime of the container). Models can be in one of 3 modes: Active, Archived, or Learning.

Selected Answer: C
C --> Alert rule with Notification

questions.question_text: What must be created in order to receive notifications about alerts generated when the operator is away from the Prisma Cloud Console?

choices.D: Only the open alerts that were generated after the enablement of remediation, with alert status updated to "resolved"
choices.C: All applicable open alerts regardless of when they were generated, with alert status updated to "dismissed"
choices.A: All applicable open alerts regardless of when they were generated, with alert status updated to "resolved"
choices.B: Only the open alerts that were generated before the enablement of remediation, with alert status updated to "resolved"

questions.question_text: Which alerts are fixed by enablement of automated remediation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A --> All applicable open alerts regardless of when they were generated are fixed, and the alert status is updated as Resolved.

https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/prisma-cloud-admin/manage-prisma-cloud-alerts/configure-prisma-cloud-to-automatically-remediate-alerts
